## Data and reports

### Scoreboard data platforms:


- Scoreboard and auxiliary indicators: interactive database compiled by Eurostat.This data platform enables to download the official scoreboard used in different [alert mechanism reports](https://ec.europa.eu/info/business-economy-euro/economic-and-fiscal-policy-coordination/eu-economic-governance-monitoring-prevention-correction/macroeconomic-imbalance-procedure/alert-mechanism-report_en) to be downloaded.
- [Latest live data for the scoreboard indicators](https://ec.europa.eu/eurostat/web/macroeconomic-imbalances-procedure/data/scoreboard) compiled by Eurostat. The data published on this page are regularly updated and may therefore differ from those used for the latest alert mechanism reports.
